name: nextjs-express-mongoose-crudify-boilerplate
description: Next.js with Express boilerplate and Mongoose CRUD support

scripts.d: NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w server -w package.json server/index.js  --exec babel-node index.js --presets es2015
scripts.build: rm -rf build && babel server -d build/server --presets es2015 && next build && mv .next build/server/.next
